
            <h1 class="postTitle">
                <a id="cb_post_title_url" class="postTitle2 vertical-middle" href="https://www.cnblogs.com/Can-daydayup/p/18995012" title="发布于 2025-07-21 08:00">
    <span role="heading" aria-level="2">.NET 使用 DocNET 库快速高效的操作 PDF 文档</span>
    

</a>

            </h1>
            <div class="clear"></div>
            <div class="postBody">
                <div id="cnblogs_post_body" class="blogpost-body blogpost-body-html">
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>前言</span></h2>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>PDF 文档，作为日常工作中不可或缺的文档格式，广泛应用于各类场景。今天我们来讲讲在 .NET 中使用 DocNET 库快速高效的操作 PDF 文档。</span></p>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>项目介绍</span></h2>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>DocNET 是一个基于 .NET 开源（MIT license）、跨平台（支持Windows、Linux和macOS平台）的旨在提供快速 PDF 编辑和数据提取的操作库。它是基于 Chromium 所使用的 PDFium C++ 库开发的 .NET Standard 2.0 封装库。</span></p>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>项目特性</span></h2>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1">
<li><span>PDF 提取功能：支持 PDF 版本、页数、页面宽度、页面高度、页面文本、字符字体大小等相关PDF信息提取。</span></li>
<li><span>PDF 编辑功能： 支持分割 PDF 文档、合并 PDF 文档、解锁 PDF 文档。</span></li>
<li><span>支持渲染页面为图像、JPEG 图片转换为 PDF 文件等等。</span></li>
</ul>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>项目源代码</span></h2>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202507/1336199-20250721015648419-644776483.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>创建DocNETExercises控制台应用</span></h2>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>创建一个名为&nbsp;<code><span>DocNETExercises</span></code><span>&nbsp;的.NET 9 控制台应用：</span></span></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202507/1336199-20250721015710958-2096936063.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202507/1336199-20250721015715822-1739362341.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>Docnet.Core NuGet包安装</span></h2>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>在 NuGet 包管理器中搜索&nbsp;<code><span>Docnet.Core</span></code><span>&nbsp;安装：</span></span></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202507/1336199-20250721015731037-1855852402.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>获取 PDF 文件页码和版本</span></h2>
<pre data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span data-cacheurl="" data-remoteid="" data-lazy-bgimg="https://mmbiz.qpic.cn/mmbiz_svg/9M0PhLTmTIfzNFlBn3E31aDEPhVgMsJ67kYMX8c6VgGRMtTxl2iba9Ziav4ticTar9ibgVgl7MjXWV53SFOZv4vpziafZSicK5Dmicx/640?wx_fmt=svg&amp;from=appmsg" data-fail="0"><code><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; /// &lt;summary&gt;<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; /// 获取 PDF 文件页码和版本<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; /// &lt;/summary&gt;<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; public static void&nbsp;GetPDFPageCountAndVersion<span>()<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; {<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; using var docReader = _docNetInstance.GetDocReader(FilePath, new PageDimensions(1080, 1920));<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; var getPageCount = docReader.GetPageCount();<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; var getPdfVersion = docReader.GetPdfVersion();<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Console.WriteLine($"PageCount：{getPageCount}，PdfVersion：{getPdfVersion}"<span>);<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; }<br></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></code></span></pre>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202507/1336199-20250721015747432-1222674339.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>获取 PDF 文件的文本内容</span></h2>
<pre data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span data-cacheurl="" data-remoteid="" data-lazy-bgimg="https://mmbiz.qpic.cn/mmbiz_svg/9M0PhLTmTIfzNFlBn3E31aDEPhVgMsJ67kYMX8c6VgGRMtTxl2iba9Ziav4ticTar9ibgVgl7MjXWV53SFOZv4vpziafZSicK5Dmicx/640?wx_fmt=svg&amp;from=appmsg" data-fail="0"><code><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; /// &lt;summary&gt;<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; /// 获取 PDF 文件的文本内容<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; /// &lt;/summary&gt;<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; public static void&nbsp;GetPDFText<span>()<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; {<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; using var docReader = _docNetInstance.GetDocReader(FilePath, new PageDimensions(1080, 1920));<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; using var pageReader = docReader.GetPageReader(0); //注意pageIndex从0开始<br><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; // 获取指定页面的文本（自动处理编码）<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; string pageText = pageReader.GetText();<br><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Console.WriteLine(pageText);<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; }</span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></code></span></pre>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202507/1336199-20250721015806894-1448474410.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>将 JPEG 图片转换为 PDF 文件</span></h2>
<pre data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span data-cacheurl="" data-remoteid="" data-lazy-bgimg="https://mmbiz.qpic.cn/mmbiz_svg/9M0PhLTmTIfzNFlBn3E31aDEPhVgMsJ67kYMX8c6VgGRMtTxl2iba9Ziav4ticTar9ibgVgl7MjXWV53SFOZv4vpziafZSicK5Dmicx/640?wx_fmt=svg&amp;from=appmsg" data-fail="0"><code><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; /// &lt;summary&gt;<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; /// 将 JPEG 图片转换为 PDF 文件<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; /// &lt;/summary&gt;<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; public static void&nbsp;JPEGImageConvertToPDF<span>()<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; {<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; var file = new JpegImage<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; {<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Bytes = File.ReadAllBytes("Assets/image1.jpeg"<span>),<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Width = 580,<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Height = 387<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; };<br><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; var bytes = _docNetInstance.JpegToPdf(new[] { file });<br><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; File.WriteAllBytes("Assets/output_file.pdf"<span>, bytes);<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; }<br></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></code></span></pre>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202507/1336199-20250721015825143-690259993.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>将 PDF 文件转换为图片</span></h2>
<pre data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span data-cacheurl="" data-remoteid="" data-lazy-bgimg="https://mmbiz.qpic.cn/mmbiz_svg/9M0PhLTmTIfzNFlBn3E31aDEPhVgMsJ67kYMX8c6VgGRMtTxl2iba9Ziav4ticTar9ibgVgl7MjXWV53SFOZv4vpziafZSicK5Dmicx/640?wx_fmt=svg&amp;from=appmsg" data-fail="0"><code><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; /// &lt;summary&gt;<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; /// 将 PDF 文件转换为图片<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; /// &lt;/summary&gt;<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; public static void&nbsp;PDFConvertToImage<span>()<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; {<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; using var docReader = _docNetInstance.GetDocReader(FilePath, new PageDimensions(1080, 1920));<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; //指定第一页<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; using var pageReader = docReader.GetPageReader(0);<br><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; var rawBytes = pageReader.GetImage();<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; var width = pageReader.GetPageWidth();<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; var height = pageReader.GetPageHeight();<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; var characters = pageReader.GetCharacters();<br><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; using var bmp = new Bitmap(width, height, PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb);<br><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; AddBytes(bmp, rawBytes);<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; DrawRectangles(bmp, characters);<br><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; using var stream = new MemoryStream();<br><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; bmp.Save(stream, ImageFormat.Png);<br><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; File.WriteAllBytes("Assets/output_image.png"<span>, stream.ToArray());<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; }<br><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; private static void AddBytes(Bitmap bmp, byte[] rawBytes)<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; {<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; var rect = new Rectangle(0, 0, bmp.Width, bmp.Height);<br><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; var bmpData = bmp.LockBits(rect, ImageLockMode.WriteOnly, bmp.PixelFormat);<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; var pNative = bmpData.Scan0;<br><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Marshal.Copy(rawBytes, 0, pNative, rawBytes.Length);<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; bmp.UnlockBits(bmpData);<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; }<br><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; private static void DrawRectangles(Bitmap bmp, IEnumerable&lt;Character&gt; characters)<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; {<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; var pen = new Pen(Color.Red);<br><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; using var graphics = Graphics.FromImage(bmp);<br><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; foreach (var c&nbsp;in<span>&nbsp;characters)<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; {<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; var rect = new Rectangle(c.Box.Left, c.Box.Top, c.Box.Right - c.Box.Left, c.Box.Bottom - c.Box.Top);<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; graphics.DrawRectangle(pen, rect);<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; }<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; }</span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></code></span></pre>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202507/1336199-20250721015846360-1099508185.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>项目源码地址</span></h2>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>更多项目实用功能和特性欢迎前往项目开源地址查看👀，别忘了给项目一个Star支持💖。</span></p>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1">
<li><strong>GitHub开源地址：</strong><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://github.com/GowenGit/docnet" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://github.com/GowenGit/docnet</span></a></span></li>
<li><strong>本文示例源码地址：</strong><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://github.com/YSGStudyHards/DotNetExercises/tree/master/DocNETExercises" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://github.com/YSGStudyHards/DotNetExercises/tree/master/DocNETExercises</span></a></span></li>
</ul>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>优秀项目和框架精选</span></h2>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>该项目已收录到C#/.NET/.NET Core优秀项目和框架精选中，关注优秀项目和框架精选能让你及时了解C#、.NET和.NET Core领域的最新动态和最佳实践，提高开发工作效率和质量。坑已挖，欢迎大家踊跃提交PR推荐或自荐（<strong>让优秀的项目和框架不被埋没🤞</strong><span>）。</span></span></p>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1">
<li><strong>GitHub开源地址：</strong><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://github.com/YSGStudyHards/DotNetGuide/blob/main/docs/DotNet/DotNetProjectPicks.md" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://github.com/YSGStudyHards/DotNetGuide/blob/main/docs/DotNet/DotNetProjectPicks.md</span></a></span></li>
<li><strong>Gitee开源地址：</strong><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://gitee.com/ysgdaydayup/DotNetGuide/blob/main/docs/DotNet/DotNetProjectPicks.md" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://gitee.com/ysgdaydayup/DotNetGuide/blob/main/docs/DotNet/DotNetProjectPicks.md</span></a></span></li>
</ul>
</div>
